author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Go to https://ground.news/sabine to get 40% off the Vantage plan and see through sensationalized reporting. Stay fully informed on events around the world with Ground News.

The 2011 Nobel Prize in physics was awarded for the discovery that the expansion of the universe is accelerating. This conclusion rested on data from supernovae. A new analysis now looks at a larger set of supernovae data and finds that the Nobel Prize winning conclusion doesn't hold up.

Paper here: https://academic.oup.com/mnras/article/544/1/975/8281988?login=false

title: Nobel Prize Discovery Incompatible With New Data
